title: Furniture Pack
description: The definition of a Content Pack for the Furniture Framework

Format.description: The Format number of the Pack.

Furniture.description: A dictionary containing your custom Furniture definitions

Display Name.description: The name of your Furniture in game. Supports [[RectVariant and [[ImageVariant]] tokens.

Description.description: The description of your Furniture. Supports [[RectVariant]] and [[ImageVariant]] tokens.

Rotations.description: The Rotations of your Furniture. Can be an integer or a list of strings.

Source Image.description: The path to your sprite-sheet. Can be a string, a dictionary of strings or an array of strings

Collisions.description: The Collisions of your Furniture. Can be directional.

Force Type.description: Used to force the vanilla type of the furniture, only use if you know what it does in the game's code.

Price.description: The default price of this Furniture in all shops it will appear. Can be changed with Content Patcher for more precision.

Placement Restriction.description: In what environment the Furniture can be placed: 0 -> Indoors, 1 -> Ourdoors, 2 -> Both.

Context Tags.description: The context tags of the Furniture, usefull for integration in shops and quests.

Exclude from Random Sales.description: If true, the Furniture will not show up in the vanilla Furniture Catalogue.

Shows in Shops.description: A list of Shop IDs where the Furniture will show up. Shop entries can be customized with Content Patcher.

Shop Id.description: The ID of the Shop that will open when the Furniture is right-clicked. Used to make custom Catalogues.

Source Rect Offsets.description: Creates multiple Furniture from this definition, each one with its Source Rectangles offset by the given value here.

Animation.description: A field with the parameters required to add animation to your Furniture.

Frame Count.description: The number of frames before the animation loops.

Frame Duration.description: The length of each animation frame, in milliseconds

Offset.description:
The offset applied to the Source Rectangles at each frame of animation.
It is also possible to provide the offset of each frame separately in a list.

Special Type.description:
Tells the mod that your Furniture is one of the following: Dresser, TV, Bed or FishTank.
Some of these have extra fields to fill, see the documentation.

Placement Type.description: How to the Furniture will be placed in the world. Can be "Normal", "Rug" or "Mural".

Icon Rect.description: The part of the Source Image to use as the icon of the Furniture in inventories.

Time Based.description: Makes your Furniture depend on the outdoor luminosity, see https://github.com/Leroymilo/FurnitureFramework/blob/3.0.0/doc/Furniture.md#Time-Based

Sounds.description: Sounds that will trigger when you right-click on the Furniture.

Mode.description: Defines when the sound will be played.

Name.description: The name of the sound in the game. See here for a list of valid sounds: https://www.stardewvalleywiki.com/Modding:Audio#Sound.

Layers.description: The Layers that will be drawn in the game to show this Furniture. At least one Layer is required.

Seats.description: The Seats where Players will be able to sit, like in a chair, or a couch.

Slots.description: The slots where players will be able to place items, like on a table.

Lights.description: Light Sources or Glows that this Furniture will emit.

Particles.description: The types of Particles that will be emitted by this Furniture.

Screen Position.description: The position of the TV screen, in pixels, starting from the bottom left of the Furniture.

Screen Scale.description: The scale of the TV screen. Vanilla normal sized TVs have a scale of 4, bigger TVs have a scale of 2.

Bed Spot.description: Where the Player will respawn in the Bed on a new day.

Bed Area.description: Defines the rectangle (in pixels) where the player will be asked to sleep.

Fish Area.description: The Rectangle of the Furniture where the fishes will be able swim.

Disable Fishtank Light.description: Disables the light that is automatically added by the game to Fish Tanks.

Included.description: Additional Furniture included from other json files

Path.description: The path (relative to the mod folder) of the json file where the included Furniture is defined.

Enabled.description: If the Furniture included in this file are enabled by default, defaults to true.
